p.b: UPDATE: The gentoo.oregonstate.edu mirror is back online and should be fully functional. Thanks for your patience.

body.p: The gentoo.oregonstate.edu mirror is having some hardware difficulties at the moment and is temporarily offline as a result. If you normally use gentoo.oregonstate.edu as your primary distfile mirror, please update the GENTOO_MIRRORS variable in your /etc/make.conf file to point to another mirror. A full list of mirrors can be found here.
